article_text: Kansas City Republican Sen. Ryan Silvey is trying yet another idea to expand Medicaid that he hopes will win over his conservative GOP colleagues. This time, he wants the feds to allow Missouri to operate Medicaid under a block grant. But just like previous efforts, it’s being pilloried by conservatives who oppose anything associated with the Affordable Care Act.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Ryan Silvey, Missouri, General Assembly, legislature, Medicaid, Affordable Care Act, Obamacare, health, insurance, expansion

article_summary:
Kansas City Republican Sen. Ryan Silvey is trying yet another idea to expand Medicaid that he hopes will win over his conservative GOP colleagues.
But just like previous efforts, it’s being pilloried by conservatives who oppose anything associated with the Affordable Care Act.
This time, he wants the feds to allow Missouri to operate Medicaid under a block grant.
